Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.jayway.restassured.mapper.ObjectMapper.GSON
    com.jayway.restassured.mapper.ObjectMapper.JACKSON
    com.jayway.restassured.mapper.ObjectMapper.JAXB
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.jayway.restassured.config.EncoderConfig.appendDefaultContentCharsetToStreamingContentTypeIfUndefined(boolean)
    Use EncoderConfig.appendDefaultContentCharsetToContentTypeIfUndefined(boolean) instead.
    com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.certificate(String, String, String, int)
    Use RestAssured.certificate(String, String, com.jayway.restassured.authentication.CertificateAuthSettings) instead.
    com.jayway.restassured.specification.AuthenticationSpecification.certificate(String, String, String, int)
    Use AuthenticationSpecification.certificate(String, String, com.jayway.restassured.authentication.CertificateAuthSettings) instead.
    com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.requestContentType()
    This method is eligible for removal. If you use it please send a mail to the mailing list.
    com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.requestContentType(ContentType)
    Use a RequestSpecBuilder to set the content-type and then set the created RequestSpecification to RestAssured.requestSpecification.
    com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.requestContentType(String)
    Use a RequestSpecBuilder to set the content-type and then set the created RequestSpecification to RestAssured.requestSpecification.
    com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.responseContentType(ContentType)
    Use ResponseSpecBuilder.expectContentType(com.jayway.restassured.http.ContentType) and assign it to RestAssured.responseSpecification instead.
    com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.responseContentType(String)
    Use ResponseSpecBuilder.expectContentType(com.jayway.restassured.http.ContentType) and assign it to RestAssured.responseSpecification instead.
